sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import HospitalMap from '../HospitalMap'; function HeartForm() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ age: '', sex: '1', cp: '0', trestbps: '', chol: '', fbs: '0', restecg: '0', thalach: '', exang: '0', oldpeak: '', slope: '0', ca: '0', thal: '0' }); const [result, setResult] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [formStep, setFormStep] = useState(1); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setError(''); setLoading(true); setResult(null); try { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const response = await axios.post( 'http://localhost:5000/api/predict/heart', formData, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` } } ); setResult(response.data); } catch (error) { setError(error.response?.data?.error || 'Prediction failed'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handleNextStep = () => { setFormStep(2); }; const handlePrevStep = () => { setFormStep(1); }; return (

‚ù§Ô∏è Heart Disease Prediction

Enter your cardiovascular health metrics for an accurate assessment

{error && (
‚ùå {error}
)}
= 1 ? 'linear-gradient(90deg, #e74c3c, #c0392b)' : '#e0e0e0', borderRadius: '3px', transition: 'all 0.3s ease' }} />
= 2 ? 'linear-gradient(90deg, #e74c3c, #c0392b)' : '#e0e0e0', borderRadius: '3px', transition: 'all 0.3s ease' }} />
{formStep === 1 && (

üìä Step 1: Basic Information

setFormData({...formData, age: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, trestbps: e.target.value})} />
)} {formStep === 2 && (

üè• Step 2: Medical Details

setFormData({...formData, chol: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, thalach: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, oldpeak: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, ca: e.target.value})} />
)} {result && (

{result.prediction === 'Positive' ? 'üö®' : '‚úÖ'} Prediction Result

Diagnosis: {result.prediction === 'Positive' ? '‚ö†Ô∏è Positive' : '‚úÖ Negative'}
Confidence: {(result.confidence * 100).toFixed(1)}%
Risk Level: {result.riskPercentage}%
Severity: {result.severity}
{result.emergencyRequired && (
üö® EMERGENCY: Seek immediate medical attention!
)}

üíä Recommendations

{result.recommendations}

{result.nearbyHospitals && result.nearbyHospitals.length > 0 && (

üè• Nearest Cardiac Care Centers

{result.nearbyHospitals.map((hospital, index) => (

#{index + 1} {hospital.hospital_name}

üìç {hospital.address}, {hospital.city}

üìû {hospital.phone}

üìè Distance: {hospital.distance?.toFixed(2)} km

‚≠ê Rating: {hospital.rating}/5.0

{hospital.emergency_services && ‚ö° Emergency Services}
))}
)}
)}
); } export default HeartForm;
